summary.title: Summary
summary.passed: Number of passed rules and techniques
summary.failed: Number of failed rules and techniques
summary.inapplicable: Number of not applicable rules and techniques
summary.warning: Number of warning rules and techniques

QW-ACT-R1.name: HTML Page has a title
QW-ACT-R1.description: This rule checks that the HTML page has a title.
QW-ACT-R1.RC3: <title> element exists and it's not empty
QW-ACT-R1.RC4: <html> element is not the root element of the page

QW-ACT-R2.name: HTML has 'lang' attribute
QW-ACT-R2.description: This rule checks that the html element has a non-empty lang or xml:lang attribute.
QW-ACT-R2.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page
QW-ACT-R2.RC5: 'lang' or 'xml:lang' attribute is empty or undefined

QW-ACT-R3.name: HTML lang and xml:lang match
QW-ACT-R3.description: The rule checks that for the html element, there is no mismatch between the primary language in non-empty lang and xml:lang attributes, if both are used.
QW-ACT-R3.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page

QW-ACT-R4.name: Meta-refresh no delay
QW-ACT-R4.description: This rule checks that the meta element is not used for delayed redirecting or refreshing.
QW-ACT-R4.RC1: Already exists one valid or invalid <meta> element above
QW-ACT-R4.RC8: It refreshes after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC9: It doesn't refresh immediately nor after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC13: It redirects after more than 20 hours
QW-ACT-R4.RC14: It doesn't redirect immediately nor after more than 20 hours

QW-ACT-R5.name: Validity of HTML 'lang' attribute
QW-ACT-R5.description: This rule checks the lang or xml:lang attribute has a valid language subtag.
QW-ACT-R5.RC2: <html> element is not the root element of the page
QW-ACT-R5.RC4: 'lang' and 'xml:lang' attributes have a valid value

ABOUT_PAGE.1: QualWeb is an automated web accessibility evaluation service which incorporates contributions from different research projects and efforts.
ABOUT_PAGE.2: QualWeb is able to automatically check a webpage against a set of
ABOUT_PAGE.3: QualWeb will also make available, from time to time, experimental modules that come out of specific research projects, and which might improve different aspects of web accessibility evaluation (for example, a module to assess the quality of text alternatives). You will always have the option to use QualWeb without these modules.
